name: .NET - ASP.NET Core Integration
description: Sentry configuration for ASP.NET Core applications with automatic request tracking
useCase: ASP.NET Core web applications with performance monitoring
seGuidance: Recommended for all ASP.NET Core customers. UseSentry() automatically captures request context, user info, and HTTP errors. Performance monitoring helps identify slow endpoints and middleware. Add Sentry.AspNetCore NuGet package.
